column5: * can be replaced with perf board
column8: Note: minimum order at JLCPCB is x5.

column1: MP1584EN 3A DC-DC Step down Supply Module
2.54mm pitch, 3 pin PCB Screw Terminals Blocks Connector 300V10A
Nano 3.0 Mini ATmega328 5v 16M Micro controller board - Arduino Clone

column8: You MUST get a genuine DFRobot version of this board as the code is not compatible with knock-off boards. This is due to difference in the serial command used for the busy signal of the different chipsets used.

column5: * can be replaced with perf board
column8: Note: minimum order at JLCPCB is x5.

column5: * can be replaced with the custom PCB

column1: NPN Transistor PN2222A in a  TO-92 Package
column8: The original board files has this item listed as a MPSA56 PNP transistor in a TO-92 package. How ever this did not work for me and other circuits I have researched are using a NPN transistor.

column1: SCI R13-521B Red 2 pole SPST mini push momentary switch
column8: This item fits the wand ear hole perfectly and does not hang lower than the available cavity space.

column1: Momentary mini Push Button Switch 1A 250VAC SPST Normally open
Single bit 5v WS2812b LED Round PCB
HT16K33 LED Dot matrix driver board

column5: * the bargraph and driver board can be wired directly to each other but this can be difficult. This method can also take up the limited space in the wand.
column8: *Note: minimum order at JLCPCB is x5. *This is a quick, easy method to wire these bargraph to its driver in a compact neat way. The board also gives means to secure the bargraph to the body of the wand in a way that is easily removed.

column1: Momentary mini Push Button Switch 1A 250VAC SPST Normally open

column5: * you can use two of these for larger smoke volume but this has power requirement implications.

column1: 510 Thread Adapter to Ego Thread connector
column8: Converts the battery thread on the Kanger Clearomizer to the Bottom Feed Squonk power wiring connector.

column1: 510 Bottom Feed Spring Loaded Red Squonk connector
column8: Power connects to this item and, in combination with the 510 thread adapter, allows for easy power wiring of the Kanger Clearomizer.

column5: * this can be replaced with a 12v version and some rewiring
* this can be replaced with a 5v version and some rewiring
